CodeExample.Title: Get the ConversationThread's CcRecipients property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the ConversationThread's CcRecipients property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/groups/<Group.objectId>/Threads/<ConversationThread.Id>/CcRecipients HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/groups//Threads/ URL to get the ConversationThread entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the CcRecipients property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=CcRecipients query option to the //myOrganization/groups//Threads/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the CcRecipients property value
